name: house of spooks
description:
House Of Spooks https://itch.io/jam/scream-jam-2020/rate/796994 It's Halloween night. You found an ad online for a haunted house. You've got nothing better to do, so you decide to go.

Mild gore warning.

Controls:
  move - WASD or arrow keys
  interact - e
  throw - f
